ocaml.in:
let padZero l1 l2 = 
if (List.length l1) > (List.length l2) then
(l1, (clone 0 ((List.length l1) - (List.length l2))) @ l2)
else 
((clone 0 ((List.length l2) - (List.length l1))) @ l1 , l2)

let rec removeZero l = match l with 
| [] -> []
| h::t -> 
if h = 0 then removeZero t else l
ocaml.min:
let rec removeZero l =
  match l with | [] -> [] | h::t -> if h = 0 then removeZero t else l;;

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let digit = (car + lastl1 + lastl2) mod 10 in
match a with
| (c,l) -> (c2, digit::l) in

let rec mulByDigit i l = match i with
| 0 -> [0]
| _ -> bigAdd l (mulByDigit(i-1) l)

let bigMul l1 l2 = 
let f a x = match a with
| (extraZeros, currentNum) -> 
(extraZeros + 1, bigAdd ((mulByDigit x l1) @ clone 0 extraZeros) currentNum) 
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXX*)
in
let base = (0,[]) in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let args = List.rev l2 in
let (_, res) = List.fold_left f base args in
res

let drop_paren s = 
implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
(r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p
